pkgmetadata.longdescription: mogwai is an Object-Graph Mapper (OGM) for Python`Documentation <https://mogwai.readthedocs.org/en/latest/>`_`Report a Bug <https://bitbucket.org/wellaware/mogwai/issues>`_NOTE: TinkerPop3 SupportZEROFAIL has graciously adopted mogwai to grow into a full fledged goblin for TinkerPop3! See more here: https://github.com/ZEROFAIL/goblin
